channel.title: Will this work?
channel.description:
I copied the contents of the "Run.bat" file for my Client and put it in a blank text document, saved it as "Run.sh" on All Files.
Will this make the client compatible with Mac? Here's the link: http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?qcrer8madevu5o7
Please only post if you know what I mean... I don't want people saying it's not working just because the server isn't up. This is a nonipchanger so it wont connect to a server (unless you change the ip in it) Please someone on a Mac try this for me, all I have is a windows computer and I want people on Mac to be able to play :D
